fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Poison a player at night.
- With the Necronomicon, instantly bleed a player during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Poisoned players die the next night, bled players at the beginning of 2 days after they were bled.
- Both effects give a notification and cannot be removed, even by Purging.
- You do not actually attack your target. Instead, you just make them die. No matter what. Nothing can save them, no defense can save them.
- Except for very specific protective roles like Paramedic that don't really give defense. Or death immunity. That will save your victim. If your victim survives for any reason, the effect will be delayed by one day/night instead.
